Stixbox Function

NOM

    diff - Differentiate or difference

SEQUENCE D'APPEL

d = diff(x [,n])

PARAMETRES

    • x :

DESCRIPTION

    Differentiate or difference, diff computes differences.

  • - for a vector X, is [X(2)-X(1) X(3)-X(2) ... X(n)-X(n-1)].
  • - for a matrix X, is the matrix of column differences, [X(2:n,:) - X(1:n-1,:)].

    • diff(X,n) is the n-th difference function.

EXAMPLES

       h = .001; x = 0:h:pi;
   diff(sin(x.^2))/h // is an approximation to 2*cos(x.^2).*x
   diff((1:10).^2) // is 3:2:19
